headline: Pepper Spray, Traffic Tactics and Cancellations as Big Day Approaches
text: Vehicles with Trump flags halted traffic on Sunday on the Garden State Parkway in New Jersey and jammed the Mario M. Cuomo Bridge between Tarrytown and Nyack, N.Y. Another pro-Trump convoy in Virginia ended in a tense shouting match with protesters as it approached a statue of Robert E. Lee in Richmond.
snippet: Law enforcement authorities are increasingly worried, not just about what they have already seen, but also about what has been threatened, especially online.
